column1: For release at 2 p.m. EDTThe Federal Reserve Board on Tuesday released the minutes of its discount rate meetings from August 22 through September 20, 2005.The minutes are attached.Attachment (33 KB PDF)2005 Monetary policy Home | News and events Accessibility Last update: October 18, 2005
